players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am very sorry to hear about Diana. We need to be careful and watch how everyone is acting today."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Charlie: "I am not the mafioso. Bob is trying to distract us from the real threat. We should focus on finding the truth together."
Bob: "Charlie is lying to save himself. I am the detective and I investigated him—he is the mafioso. Trust me, voting him out now is the only way to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Bob's accusations are too convenient and rushed. Why would the detective reveal himself so early without proof? Alice has stayed quiet—perhaps we should hear her thoughts before rushing."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I am very sorry to hear about Diana. We need to be careful and watch how everyone is acting today."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Charlie: "I am not the mafioso. Bob is trying to distract us from the real threat. We should focus on finding the truth together."
You: "Charlie is lying to save himself. I am the detective and I investigated him—he is the mafioso. Trust me, voting him out now is the only way to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Bob's accusations are too convenient and rushed. Why would the detective reveal himself so early without proof? Alice has stayed quiet—perhaps we should hear her thoughts before rushing."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
